Reviews.Title: Very nice TV
Reviews.Author: Peter Hartman
Reviews.Content: This TV is actually only has a 20,000 dynamic contrast ratio.I have only spent about 3 hours with this TV thus far but so far its met all my expectations. I have a media center with xbmc and aeon and the picture is fantastic. The picture and colors are almost perfect straight out of the box. I will be tweaking the setting down the road though. The only thing I am not totally satisfied with is the sound. The speakers do seem to be a bit weak.

Reviews.Title: 46" Great screen for price.
Reviews.Author: JRod
Reviews.Content: Setup easy. Speakers appear to fire down and reflect to you. Getting to sound menu not as easy as others.Samsung download center is great, keep a usb handy for firmware updates.Video setup has Game mode.Audio has entertainment mode.43.5" wide for 46" diag! PIP crystal clear. See photo.2 HDMI inputs, 2 component, so know what is plugged where before you disconnect old equipment. AnyNet + feature is great! Samsung tv links to Samsumg Blu-ray with Anynet+ via HDMI. Both remotes work the other device.Sample dvd: Transformers and Blu-ray version. Great picture. Qatar base attack sound levels off, turned off Auto Volume feature to get full explosion and pulse wave effects.Samsung BD-P1500 1080p Blu-ray Player

Reviews.Title: ln46a500 great tv
Reviews.Author: micheal
Reviews.Content: i purchased the ln46a500 for 276.00 the top left hand corner was banged up and the lower right corner was banged up and also no stand,it was listed as model ln46b530 when i checked the service menu it said ln46a500 but it does have 3 hdmi in the back, i purchased a stand with the model number ln46b530 it did not fit, i am trying to find the right stand for the right model number not easy, as far as the picture and integrity of the set it is amazing, color is amazing, it works very well no problems as of yet i only had it for three months but it is on for 4 to 6 hrs a day, extremely happy with this tv.

Reviews.Title: Incredible value for price ( I got for $1095.00) !!!!
Reviews.Author: StatAppleAnnie "HealthcarePractioner"
Reviews.Content: I believe for their size the speakers have great clarity. I do plan on adding a sound system in the future for movies, games and such. Totally a "cinch" to use right out of the box. Great set up; on screen menu and good picture (even w/o HDTV as yet) !!!  The only TV I'll give 5 stars to; will be LED, and hasn't really been perfected yet; nor has the price been "obtainable" for most. I'd give this one 4.5 stars if I could though; am VERY SATISFIED !!!  You could definitely do worse; especially for the money.
